author: andreas
content: Well, you can get pretty shallow with the LX5, although you have to use f2.0 and this means you have to be at 24mm. This is also the only way to get near enough to get small enough DOF out of this aperture/sensor combo. Near means below one inch. You can't do that always, and if you do, you have to live with wide-angle distortions. In other words: this is not a portrait lens ðŸ™‚
